name: Pom Flexible Vibrator
about: What it is:A flexible, waterproof vibe that gives you broad or targeted stimulation with a powerful, rumbly motor and five patterns..Highlighted Features:- Medical-Grade Silicone.What Else You Need to Know:Pom is flexible and bends to your every whim. It‘s soft and flexible enough to conform to your hip movements and snuggle close to your vulva. Pom is intuitive, ergonomic, and small enough to nestle within the palm of your hand. It has tactile, intuitive controls for a confusion-free user experience..Device Size:3.25 x 2.2 x 1.2..This Device Comes With:- Pom Vibrator
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Using Pom:.-Please fully charge your Pom before use. .-Pom has a button for power and patterns and another for intensity. .-You can change the vibration strength for any setting in two ways: Hold the intensity button for a steady change of vibration strength or press the intensity button to change vibration strength in steps. ..Charging Pom:.-If the battery is low the LED will blink red when the power button is pressed...Travel Mode:.-Hold the power button for 10 seconds to activate Travel Mode—the LED will blink for those 10 seconds and flash red at the end. .-Pom cannot be turned on accidentally while in Travel Mode..-Plug Pom in to exit Travel Mode. ..Caring for Pom:.-Pom is waterproof. .-Clean Pom after every use using either soap and water or a water-based sex toy cleaner. .-Store Pom separately from other toys and away from extreme heat or cold. ..Caution:.-Do not use silicone-based lube with Pom. .-Do not clean Pom with products containing alcohol, petroleum, or acetone. .-Do not boil, bake, microwave, or clean Pom in the dishwasher. .-Do not overbend.

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the softest vibrators I’ve ever owned! I got the plum color and it’s unique when it comes to shade — most vibrators are gaudy colors like hot pink or bright blue. There are two buttons, one that controls the mode, and one that controls the intensity. They’re rather easy to hit when in use, so I would count that as a flaw unfortunately. My favorite vibrators just have one button for ease of use. It definitely took some getting used to, as it’s not the type of vibrator usually marketed widely. It’s also extremely expensive for what it is, so I don’t think I would repurchase this if I had to.

reviews.review_text: My husband bought us a Dame Valentine's Day kit that included Pom (plum) and Eva (fir). It has a really nice soft targeted nib that provides a focal point. So many of the toys in this category are useless, flashy, showy, big, dumb and impractical. Pom is friendly and beautifully designed to do its job in the best way possible transporting the notion of 'user-friendliness' into another galaxy.

reviews.review_title: Highly Recommended by a Sex Coach
reviews.review_text: I'm a sex coach and this is by far the most intuitive stone vibrator (as I call them) that I've tried. The way its shaped, along with how the buttons are indented so you can't accidentally click them is so smart. The way you turn it off is also smart - you need to hold two buttons at the same time.
